dmca.title: Images DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
VIA  e-mail:   [redacted]@google.com
<mailto:[redacted]@google.com> 

Google, Inc.

Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

 

Re:       NOTICE AND TAKE DOWN - 
http://comixsuperheroesdude.blogspot.com/

 

 

Dear Blogger Legal Support:

 

Marvel Entertainment, LLC ("Marvel") is a character-based entertainment
company with a proprietary library of over 8,000 characters.  Marvel
owns or controls the copyrights, trademarks, and other intellectual
property rights in and to the following publications and characters
featured in such publications: Alpha Flight, Ant Man, Avengers,
Bullseye, Captain America, Carnage, Cyclops, Doctor Doom, Doctor
Octopus, Doctor Strange, Elektra, Fear Itself, Iron Fist, Iron Man,
Hawkeye, Hulk, Juggernaut, Magneto, Moon Knight, Namor, Scarlet Witch,
She-Hulk, Silver Surfer, Spider-Girl, Spider-Man, Thing, Thor,
Thunderbolts, Venom, Vision, Wasp, Wolverine, and X-men, among others.  

 

The following permalinks contain images that infringe Marvel's
copyrights and trademarks.  Additionally, these links provide access to
downloads which contain complete, unauthorized reproductions of Marvel
comic book publications:

 

http://comixsuperheroesdude.blogspot.com/2011/07/fear-itself-new-avenger
s.html

Please direct all correspondence to:

 

Gregory Pan, Legal Affairs

Marvel Entertainment, LLC

[redacted] 

New York, NY 10020

Phone: (212) [redacted] ext. 8619

Fax: (212) 572-[redacted]

[redacted]@marvel.com <mailto:[redacted]@marvel.com> 

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages and the linked
pages on these pages is not authorized by Marvel, its agent or the law.

 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

 

Please act expeditiously to remove the material identified and contact
me at 

(212) [redacted] ext. 8619, or [redacted[@marvel.com if you have any questions.

Marvel reserves the right to take all available remedies available at
law and in equity to protect its interests, and nothing in this letter
shall be construed as a waiver or relinquishment of any rights or
remedies available to it.

 

Sincerely,

 

Gregory Pan

 

 

 

Gregory Pan, Associate Counsel, Director of Consumer Products, Legal,
Tel:  1 (212) [redacted] (ex 8619) Mobile: 1 (646) [redacted]   e-mail: 
[redacted]@marvel.com <mailto:gpan@marvel.com> 

Marvel Legal & Business Affairs, Marvel Entertainment, LLC

This e-mail message is confidential, and is intended only for the named
recipient(s) above, and may contain information that is privileged,
attorney work product or exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If
you have received this message in error, or are not the named
recipient(s), please immediately notify the sender  and delete this
e-mail message from your computer.  Thank you.

 


******************************************************************************
Nothing contained in this e-mail shall (a) be considered a legally binding agreement, amendment or modification of any agreement with Marvel, each of which requires a fully executed agreement to be received by Marvel or (b) be deemed approval of any product, packaging, advertising or promotion material, which may only come from Marvel's Legal Department.
******************************************************************************
